data.text: @Kevin20051227 @CityNewsKIT It’s all theatre. The last thing they want is for everyone to realize the truckers were right all along. The science has been saying we should’ve opened up long ago but they’re acting as though the science is only changing now. Polls are the only thing that have changed recently.
@nicoledelville @Mtrask123 @jack_eskens @CityNewsKIT So what is your long term strategy?  Wear masks forever?

@nicoledelville @jack_eskens @CityNewsKIT So you’re one of those people who think people that are not sic should wear a mask for no reason. Just in case? I feel sorry for you living in such fear. Just keep your distance and wear one if you want. Sweden did that and it worked better then what we did.

@nicoledelville @Mtrask123 @jack_eskens @CityNewsKIT I wear a “fashionable” mask that conforms yet does absolutely nothing to protect me or anyone else and so does a very high percentage of the population
@Pammer1920 @CityNewsKIT Did that a year ago. Feels good.
@CityNewsKIT Why not now? you think waiting until the 21st makes any fucking difference?
@Pammer1920 @CityNewsKIT I’m with all the mandate, fear and all the fake news and propaganda..
@nicoledelville @Mtrask123 @jack_eskens @CityNewsKIT The masks that 99% of people are wearing do nothing.
@CityNewsKIT Who else is having a mask burning party????..

@jack_eskens @nicoledelville @Mtrask123 @CityNewsKIT Particles, eg. airborne particles like if someone were to sneeze. It protects the wearer of the N95 as water droplets from the unmasked individuals nose does not get up the wearer's nose due to that mask/barrier being in place. https://t.co/8WsGPRINe4
